data.description:
Objective: Implement end-to-end post-invocation orchestration for verification and retry/close outcomes.

Notes: Tasks can be split across event handling, job orchestration, and bead state services, then integrated behind one workflow entrypoint.

Assigned tasks:
- Hook agent completion to verification transition
- Implement commit-label remediation loop
- Launch verifier agent using commit label
- Apply verifier outcomes to bead state
- Add orchestration idempotency and dedupe locks
- Persist verification lifecycle events
